meanings.definition: A married woman who manages a household.
meanings.sent1: The housewife cooked dinner for her family every evening.
meanings.sent2: The housewife takes care of the children and keeps the house tidy.
meanings.sent3: The housewife tried to teach her pet cat to do the dishes, but it didn't work out.
meanings.sent4: The housewife's home was her kingdom, where she ruled with love and care.
meanings.sent5: The housewife's dedication to her family and home was unwavering.

meanings.definition: A woman who is in charge of the household duties.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, the housewife made sure breakfast was ready for everyone.
meanings.sent2: The housewife organized the cleaning schedule for the entire week.
meanings.sent3: The housewife decided to have a dance party while doing the laundry to make chores more fun.
meanings.sent4: The housewife's determination to keep her home running smoothly was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The housewife's attention to detail in her household duties was impressive.
